title: AlmaLinux Goes Its Way, Adds Two New Repositories
description:
AlmaLinux introduces Testing and Synergy repositories for an enriched Enterprise Linux journey. Learn more about it here!

The post AlmaLinux Goes Its Way, Adds Two New Repositories appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Rhino Linux 2023.2 Brings Fully Functional LUKS Disk Encryption
description:
Rhino Linux 2023.2 arrives, boasting Linux kernel 6.5 and with changes both visually and under the hood. Here’s what’s new!

The post Rhino Linux 2023.2 Brings Fully Functional LUKS Disk Encryption appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Vivaldi 6.2 Brings Big Performance, Memory Usage Improvements
description:
With the new Vivaldi 6.2 release, some massive gains in performance, and memory usage have been promised. Let’s see what it’s all about.

The post Vivaldi 6.2 Brings Big Performance, Memory Usage Improvements appeared first on Linux Today.

title: DietPi v8.21 Is Now Available: Here’s What’s New
description:
DietPi v8.21 comes with new and improved hardware support, kernel updates, fixes, and more. Check out the full release notes here.

The post DietPi v8.21 Is Now Available: Here’s What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Firefox 118 Enters Beta Testing With Built-In Translation Feature for Websites
description:
The new translation feature didn’t make it in Firefox 117 and looks like it will be tested in the Firefox 118 beta. Learn more here.

The post Firefox 118 Enters Beta Testing With Built-In Translation Feature for Websites appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Mozilla Firefox 117 Is Now Available: Here’s What’s New
description:
Firefox 117 comes with a built-in and automatic translation engine for websites that’s privacy-aware, translating content locally in your web browser.

The post Mozilla Firefox 117 Is Now Available: Here’s What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Linux Kernel 6.5 Released With Wi-Fi 7, MIDI 2.0 Support
description:
In this guide, we will take a look at the many new features that released with Linux kernel 6.5. Learn more here.

The post Linux Kernel 6.5 Released With Wi-Fi 7, MIDI 2.0 Support appeared first on Linux Today.
